fields.Title: THOUGHT / REVACHOLIAN NATIONHOOD
fields.Description: Endurance explains you are a Fascist. It's all about the Revacholian Nationhood.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Föminist? No! It can't be. Not you...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Föminist? No! It can't be. Not you. No one believes this.

fields.Title: You: "The what? Sounds like my stomach is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The what? Sounds like my stomach is growling...

fields.Title: Endurance: "That's what fascism boils down to...."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's what fascism boils down to. The rest is also important, but the *main thing* is that wömen need to *know their place*.

fields.Title: You: "I will keeps my vöws... for the glo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I will keeps my vöws... for the glory of the Revacholian nation. (Opt in.)

fields.Title: Endurance: "Many things, but it's möstly about..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Many things, but it's möstly about trusting your gut. Who does your gut tell you is the source of Revachol's problems?

fields.Title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: You: "Foreigners?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Foreigners?

fields.Title: Endurance: "Lower intestine? The term is METABO..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lower intestine? The term is METABOLIC AND CIRCULATORY SYSTEM.

fields.Title: You: "*Fascism* sounds so bad, though. Wh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Fascism* sounds so bad, though. What if we called it something else? Like, uh, *traditionalism*?

fields.Title: You: "Absolutely not. I'm not going to be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Absolutely not. I'm not going to be played by an upset stomach. (Opt out.)

fields.Title: You: "No, fascism is about industry and p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, fascism is about industry and politics and nationhood, not wömen. I'm absolutely okay with women.

fields.Title: Endurance: "For the nation... smart. Best not t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For the nation... smart. Best not to mention *the wömen issue* too often. People are not ready.

fields.Title: Endurance: "It's clear you like the hard stuff,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's clear you like the hard stuff, bröther.

fields.Title: You: "But I'm a feminist!"
fields.Dialogue Text: But I'm a feminist!

fields.Title: You: "Leftist academicians?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Leftist academicians?

fields.Title: You: "Why am I getting this?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Why am I getting this?

fields.Title: You: "Okay, but... what's *the hard stuff..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, but... what's *the hard stuff*?

fields.Title: Endurance: "No, no. When the blööd and the fles..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, no. When the blööd and the flesh call, there is no discarding them. Speak true, do you like *the hard stuff*?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "That sounds much better. Traditiona..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That sounds much better. Traditionalism. You like the sound of that.

fields.Title: You: "What *is* fascism, though?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What *is* fascism, though?

fields.Title: You: "Wömen?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Wömen?

fields.Title: Tutorial Agent: "Did you know you can FORGET Thought..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Did you know you can FORGET Thoughts? Go to your THOUGHT CABINET and FORGET all about föminism.

fields.Title: You: "What is my lower intestine going on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What is my lower intestine going on about?

fields.Title: Endurance: "You're going to keep your vöws, rig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're going to keep your vöws, right? Keep your vöws, bröther!

fields.Title: You: "Pat your stomach. [Finish thought.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: Pat your stomach. [Finish thought.]

fields.Title: Endurance: "*Fascism*, bröther."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Fascism*, bröther.

fields.Title: You: "Am I having some kind of stomach se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Am I having some kind of stomach seizure?

fields.Title: Endurance: "Yes, them, but also..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, them, but also...

fields.Title: Endurance: "For the nation... smart. Best not t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For the nation... smart. Best not to mention *the wömen* too often. That's why you're the head and I am the stomach.

fields.Title: Endurance: "There's a slow, painful growl somew..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a slow, painful growl somewhere in your intestines, knocking on your alcohol-engorged liver...

fields.Title: Endurance: "Ökay. Yes. Let's call it that. Good..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Ökay. Yes. Let's call it that. Good thinking.

fields.Title: You: "What is *the hard stuff*?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What is *the hard stuff*?

fields.Title: You: "Liberals?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Liberals?

fields.Title: Endurance: "Stomach truth. You're having a stom..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stomach truth. You're having a stomach *truth*.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Because you've said the hard things..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Because you've said the hard things, that others won't say. The gööd things. You've said them many times.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Wö-Men. Men of Wö. You don't like t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wö-Men. Men of Wö. You don't like them. They're insane. Their idiocy needs to be scrubbed off this world with rubbing alcohol. Wömen need to go back to the fucking kitchen.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Of course you are, bröther. Of cour..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course you are, bröther. Of course. (A wink-shaped growl sounds from your ass.)

fields.Title: Endurance: "Evening falls. The time has come to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Evening falls. The time has come to take the vows.

fields.Title: You: "Vows?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Vows?

fields.Title: Endurance: "The Vows of Blööd and Flesh."
fields.Dialogue Text: The Vows of Blööd and Flesh.

fields.Title: You: "Okay, stomach. I've made up my mind..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, stomach. I've made up my mind about fascism. (Proceed to the Jüdgement.)

fields.Title: You: "I thought you were my circulatory s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I thought you were my circulatory system?

fields.Title: You: "Financiers?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Financiers?

fields.Title: Endurance: "...wömen."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...wömen.

fields.Title: Endurance: "Quit stalling, bröther! We were tal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Quit stalling, bröther! We were talking about the weakest, worst, most insane thing. The weak link!

fields.Title: Endurance: "It is one of betrayal and disappoin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is one of betrayal and disappointment.
